definition: decadents (of the Decadent movement of late 19th century Europe)
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: His face was a decadent face.
He is a member of beat generation .
This is probably the source of the name given them, "The Beats".
sentences.chinese: 這也許就是他們被稱作頹廢派的原因。
